Product gallery

  • Result
  • HTML
  • Pug
<!-- Product gallery -->
<div class="cs-product-gallery">

  <!-- Preview image -->
  <div class="cs-preview order-sm-2">
    <div class="cs-preview-item active" id="first">
      <img src="path-to-preview-image" alt="Product preview"/>
    </div>
    <div class="cs-preview-item" id="second">
      <img src="path-to-preview-image" alt="Product preview"/>
    </div>
    <div class="cs-preview-item" id="third">
      <img src="path-to-preview-image" alt="Product preview"/>
    </div>
    <div class="cs-preview-item" id="fourth">
      <img src="path-to-preview-image" alt="Product preview"/>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- Thumbnails -->
  <div class="cs-thumblist order-sm-1">
    <a class="cs-thumblist-item active" href="#first">
      <img src="path-to-thumbnail" alt="Product thumb"/>
    </a>
    <a class="cs-thumblist-item" href="#second">
      <img src="path-to-thumbnail" alt="Product thumb"/>
    </a>
    <a class="cs-thumblist-item" href="#third">
      <img src="path-to-thumbnail" alt="Product thumb"/>
    </a>
    <a class="cs-thumblist-item" href="#fourth">
      <img src="path-to-thumbnail" alt="Product thumb"/>
    </a>
  </div>
</div>
// Product gallery
.cs-product-gallery

  // Preview image
  .cs-preview.order-sm-2
    #first.cs-preview-item.active
      +image("path-to-preview-image", "Product preview")
    #second.cs-preview-item
      +image("path-to-preview-image", "Product preview")
    #third.cs-preview-item
      +image("path-to-preview-image", "Product preview")
    #fourth.cs-preview-item
      +image("path-to-preview-image", "Product preview")

  // Thumbnails
  .cs-thumblist.order-sm-1
    a(href="#first").cs-thumblist-item.active
      +image("path-to-thumbnail", "Product thumb")
    a(href="#second").cs-thumblist-item
      +image("path-to-thumbnail", "Product thumb")
    a(href="#third").cs-thumblist-item
      +image("path-to-thumbnail", "Product thumb")
    a(href="#fourth").cs-thumblist-item
      +image("path-to-thumbnail", "Product thumb")

    <div class="mr-sm-n6 pb-5">
      <h2 class="h1 text-sm-nowrap">Virtual Reality</h2>

        Gadgets from top brands at discounted price
      </p>
      <div class="d-inline-block bg-faded-danger text-danger font-size-sm font-weight-medium rounded-sm px-3 py-2">
        Limited time offer
      </div>
      <div class="cs-countdown pt-3 h4 justify-content-center justify-content-sm-start" data-countdown="10/01/2021 07:00:00 PM">
        <div class="cs-countdown-days">
          <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
          <span class="cs-countdown-label font-size-xs text-muted">Days</span>
        </div>
        <div class="cs-countdown-hours">
          <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>
          <span class="cs-countdown-label font-size-xs text-muted">Hours</span>
        </div>
        <div class="cs-countdown-minutes">
          <span class="cs-countdown-value">0</span>

        </div>
      </div>
      <a class="btn btn-primary" href="#">Get one now</a>
    </div>
    <div><img src="path-to-image" alt="Promo banner"/>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
// Promo banner with coundown
.bg-secondary.rounded-lg.pt-5.px-3.pl-sm-5.pr-sm-2

    .mr-sm-n6.pb-5
      h2.h1.text-sm-nowrap Virtual Reality
      p.pb-2.mx-auto.mx-sm-0(style="max-width: 14rem;") Gadgets from top brands at discounted price

        | Limited time offer

        .cs-countdown-days
          span.cs-countdown-value 0
          span.cs-countdown-label.font-size-xs.text-muted Days
        .cs-countdown-hours
          span.cs-countdown-value 0
          span.cs-countdown-label.font-size-xs.text-muted Hours
